Uses of Class
org.dulab.javanmf.updaterules.RegularizationUpdateRule

Packages that use RegularizationUpdateRule 
Package Description
org.dulab.javanmf.updaterules
Provides classes for updating matrix H in the direction of minimising the distance D(X, WH).

  • Uses of RegularizationUpdateRule in org.dulab.javanmf.updaterules

    Subclasses of RegularizationUpdateRule in org.dulab.javanmf.updaterules 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  MUpdateRule
    Performs multiplicative update for the euclidean distance with regularization
